sn43.15:1.1: Saccañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi saccagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.16:1.1: Pārañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi pāragāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.17:1.1: Nipuṇañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi nipuṇagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.18:1.1: Sududdasañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi sududdasagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.19:1.1: Ajajjarañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi ajajjaragāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.20:1.1: Dhuvañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi dhuvagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.21:1.1: Apalokitañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi apalokitagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.22:1.1: Anidassanañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi anidassanagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.23:1.1: Nippapañcañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi nippapañcagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.24:1.1: Santañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi santagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.25:1.1: Amatañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi amatagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.26:1.1: Paṇītañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi paṇītagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.27:1.1: Sivañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi sivagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.28:1.1: Khemañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi khemagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.29:1.1: Taṇhākkhayañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi taṇhākkhayagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.30:1.1: Acchariyañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi acchariyagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.31:1.1: Abbhutañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi abbhutagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.32:1.1: Anītikañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi anītikagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.33:1.1: Anītikadhammañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi anītikadhammagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.34:1.1: Nibbānañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi nibbānagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.35:1.1: Abyābajjhañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi abyābajjhagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.36:1.1: Virāgañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi virāgagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.37:1.1: Suddhiñca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi suddhigāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.37:1.2: Taṁ suṇātha. Katamā ca, bhikkhave, suddhi …pe….
sn43.38:1.1: Muttiñca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi muttigāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.38:1.2: Taṁ suṇātha. Katamā ca, bhikkhave, mutti …pe….
sn43.39:1.1: Anālayañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi anālayagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.39:1.2: Taṁ suṇātha. Katamo ca, bhikkhave, anālayo …pe….
sn43.40:1.1: Dīpañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi dīpagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.41:1.1: Leṇañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi leṇagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.42:1.1: Tāṇañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi tāṇagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.43:1.1: Saraṇañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi saraṇagāmiñca maggaṁ.
